name: insert_lines_in_region
description: CSI L (Insert Lines) within a scroll region pushes content down, bottom line lost
comment: Print A-E on rows 0-4 at col 0. DECSTBM(2,4) sets scroll region rows 1-3 (0-indexed), cursor -> (0,0). CUP(2,1) to (1,0). IL(1) inserts blank at row 1, B->row2, C->row3, D lost. Print X at (1,0). Row 0=A, 1=X, 2=B, 3=C, 4=E.
